<style>
.font-preview-page {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 6rem 2rem 4rem 2rem;
}

.font-preview-page h1 {
  font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  color: #fff;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-preview-page h1 { color: #1a1a1a; }

.font-preview-page .page-subtitle {
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-preview-page .page-subtitle { color: #666; }

.font-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

@media (max-width: 800px) {
  .font-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
}

.font-card {
  border-radius: 16px;
  overflow: hidden;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
  transition: border-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  display: block;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.font-card:hover {
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.25);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card {
  border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card:hover {
  border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.font-card-hero {
  position: relative;
  height: 180px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.font-card-hero img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.font-card-hero .overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.6) 100%);
}

.font-card-hero .hero-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1.5rem;
  z-index: 1;
}

.font-card-hero .hero-title {
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  line-height: 1.1;
  color: #fff;
  text-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  margin: 0;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.font-card-hero .hero-divider {
  width: 1px;
  height: 60px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
}

.font-card-hero .hero-roles {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 0.4rem;
}

.font-card-hero .hero-roles span {
  font-size: 0.55rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
}

.font-card-body {
  padding: 1.25rem;
}

.font-card-label {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: baseline;
  margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08);
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card-label { border-bottom-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.06); }

.font-card-label .pairing-name {
  font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card-label .pairing-name { color: #1a1a1a; }

.font-card-label .font-names {
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.65rem;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card-label .font-names { color: #999; }

.font-card-body .sample-heading {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
  color: #e0e0e0;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card-body .sample-heading { color: #1a1a1a; }

.font-card-body .sample-text {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  margin: 0;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .font-card-body .sample-text { color: #555; }

.current-badge {
  display: inline-block;
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.55rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.08em;
  padding: 0.15rem 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: rgba(113, 178, 128, 0.25);
  color: #71b280;
  margin-left: 0.5rem;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .current-badge {
  background: rgba(45, 90, 39, 0.12);
  color: #2d5a27;
}

.back-link {
  display: inline-block;
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  text-decoration: none;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.back-link:hover { color: #fff; }
body:not(.quarto-dark) .back-link { color: #666; }
body:not(.quarto-dark) .back-link:hover { color: #1a1a1a; }

.click-hint {
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .click-hint { color: #aaa; }
</style>
